app.fb_placeholder: Trouble with something technical? Let us know.
app.desc_create_form: Choose a method to create a new form.
app.desc_custom: Start a new form from the ground up, tailored to your needs.
app.desc_templates: Choose from a variety of pre-designed templates to jumpstart your form creation.
app.desc_custom_form: Complete the fields below to create a custom form from scratch.
app.desc_form_name: Provide a unique name for your form to identify it easily.
app.desc_form_desc: Add a brief description to inform users about the purpose of this form.
app.desc_form_templates: Choose a template to quickly get started with your form creation process.
app.desc_form_share: Make your form accessible to others and start collecting responses.
app.desc_link_share: Copy the link below to easily share your form with others.
app.desc_not_public: This form is currently private. To make it public, go to the settings page and update its status.
app.desc_reviewed: This indicates that the submission has already been reviewed and processed.
app.desc_not_reviewed: This indicates that the submission is pending review and requires attention.
app.desc_ignored: This indicates that the submission has been intentionally disregarded and marked as ignored.
app.desc_coming_soon: We are working hard to bring you this feature. Stay tuned!
app.desc_general: Customize the overall settings of your form.
app.desc_submit_text: Customize the text displayed on the form's submit button.
app.desc_app_branding: Show Powered by Nexuform' on your form.
app.required_submit_text: Submit text must contain at least 3 letters.
app.desc_status: Manage the availability of your form by setting it as published, inactive, or in draft mode.
app.desc_draft: The form is being created or edited. It’s not available for users to access yet.
app.desc_published: The form is live and can be accessed, filled out, and submitted by users.
app.desc_inactive: The form is no longer available for users to fill out or submit.
app.desc_delete_form: Permanently delete this form and all its associated data from our servers. This action cannot be undone
app.desc_absolute_delete_form: This action will permanently delete the selected form, along with all associated submissions and settings.
app.label_absolute_type_email_delete_form: Type the name of the form to delete it.
app.desc_tips_form: Start by adding blocks like text fields, multiple choice, and more.
app.desc_tips_design: Adjust colors, order, and layout to match your brand.
app.desc_tips_settings: Define settings like title, description, and permissions.
app.desc_tips_share: Make your form available and share it with your audience.
app.desc_blocks: Select and add new block to your form. Customize each block to suit your needs and enhance the user experience.
app.desc_short_text: A single-line input field for brief text responses.
app.desc_paragraph_text: A multi-line input field for detailed text responses.
app.desc_checkboxes: Allows the selection of multiple options from a list.
app.desc_multiple_choice: Allows the selection of a single option from a list.
app.desc_dropdown_menu: A collapsible menu for selecting a single option.
app.desc_number_input: An input field specifically for numeric values.
app.desc_email_address: An input field for capturing valid email addresses.
app.desc_star_rating: A scale for rating, typically displayed as stars.
app.desc_custom_scale: A range-based scale for responses, such as 1–10.
app.desc_settings: Configure your form preferences and update settings as needed.
app.desc_success_title: Set the title that will be displayed after the form is successfully submitted.
app.desc_success_desc: Enter the message that will be shown after the form is successfully submitted.
app.desc_design: Customize the appearance of your form.
app.desc_numeric_blocks: Enable this option to display numeric identifiers for each block.
app.desc_uppercase_block: When enabled, block names will be displayed in uppercase.
app.desc_form_width: Choose how the form width should be displayed: centered or full width.
app.desc_primary_color: Choose the main color for your design. This color will be used for key elements.
app.desc_reorder_blocks: There are currently no blocks available to reorder. Add blocks to start organizing them.
app.desc_block_settings: Customize the settings for this form block.
app.desc_block_name: The label displayed above the input field.
app.desc_block_desc: Additional information displayed below the input to guide the user.
app.desc_block_placeholder: A hint text inside the input field before the user types.
app.desc_block_max_limit: Set the maximum number of characters allowed in this field.
app.desc_block_show_char: If enabled, a character counter will be displayed below the field.
app.desc_block_required: If enabled, users must fill out this field before submitting.
app.desc_block_options: Add multiple options for users to select from.
app.desc_mark_identifier: This field will be used as an identifier for unique user actions.
app.tt_mark_identifier: When enabled, this block will be used as an identifier for specific actions or configurations.
app.desc_max_rating: Set the maximum number of stars users can rate.
app.desc_max_scale: Define the highest value in the scale for user selection.
app.success_cta: Want to create a form like this?
app.desc_account_pref: Customize your profile, account settings, and preferences to tailor your Nexuform experience.
app.desc_profile_info: Manage and update your personal details.
app.desc_delete_account: Delete your account and all its associated data. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.
app.desc_billing_and_usage: View information about your billing and usage.
app.desc_plan_summary: Your current plan for this billing cycle.
app.desc_usage: Your current usage across this billing cycle.
app.desc_password: Update your password to enhance security. Choose a strong password that includes letters, numbers, and special characters.
app.required_n_char: At least {n, plural, =1 {# character} other {# characters}}.
app.required_n_lower: At least {n, plural, =1 {# lowercase letter} other {# lowercase letters}}.
app.required_n_upper: At least {n, plural, =1 {# uppercase letter} other {# uppercase letters}}.
app.required_n_special: At least {n, plural, =1 {# special character} other {# special characters}}.
app.required_n_number: At least {n, plural, =1 {# number} other {# numbers}}.
app.required_n_letters: At least {n, plural, =1 {# letter} other {# letters}}.
app.label_n_days_remaining: {n, plural, =1 {# day remaining} other {# days remaining}}
app.desc_sub_cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? You will lose access to all premium features
app.label_sub_cancel_alert: You will lose access to all content immediately upon canceling your subscription
app.label_sub_cancel_warning_feats: You will lose access to all these features
app.desc_manage_sub: Choose the plan that best fits your needs.
app.desc_delete_personal_account: This action will permanently delete all of your forms, along with all the related data. This includes all responses, settings, and any associated files. Once deleted, this data cannot be recovered.
app.label_type_delete_personal_account: Type your related account email to continue.
app.label_delete_personal_account_alert: This action is not reversible. Once confirmed, all your forms and associated data will be permanently deleted. Please be absolutely certain before proceeding.
app.err_delete_personal_account: An unexpected error occurred while deleting this account.
app.feat_forms: Up to {n, plural, =1 {# form} other {# forms}}
app.feat_submissions: Up to {n, plural, =1 {# submission} other {# submissions}}
app.desc_upgrade_pro: To access this feature, you must upgrade your subscription to pro plan.
app.desc_error_generic: Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.
app.label_more_templates_alert: More templates will be released over time to expand your options.
app.desc_no_forms: Get started by creating your first form and collecting responses with ease.
app.label_form_not_available: This form is not available or does not exist.
app.desc_upgrade_sub: To keep using our plataform update your subscription.
app.desc_help: Feel free to reach out to us via email with any questions or concerns:
app.desc_active_sub: Now you can start enjoying all the benefits.
app.desc_date_picker: Select a date from the calendar dropdown or enter it manually.
app.desc_qr_share: Scan the QR code or copy the link to share your form with others quickly and effortlessly.
app.desc_checkout: Please review your items and payment information before completing your purchase.
app.desc_start_form: Build your layout with blocks—browse the components to get started.
app.desc_account_settings: Manage your personal information, security, and account preferences
app.desc_success_form: Thank you for submitting your form. We have received your information and will process it shortly.
app.label_analytics_warning: Data includes both active and deleted forms. Historical metrics may not reflect the current scenario.
app.desc_contact_support: Reach out to us via email for assistance
app.label_billing_warning: Within the subscription cycle, monthly usage also includes form submissions, even those that have been disabled or deleted.
app.desc_sub_cancelled: Your subscription has been cancelled. Update your plan to continue using our services.
app.desc_current_plan: You're currently on the { subscription } plan
app.desc_manage_sub2: Manage or upgrade your subscription anytime.
app.desc_save_options: Choose how you want to save your form
app.desc_save_publish: Save and make this form publicly available
app.label_editor_no_blocks_warn: You cannot publish a form without any blocks. Please add at least one block to proceed.
app.label_tip_publish_to_share: Publish the form to enable sharing options
app.label_tip_configure_privacy: Configure privacy settings in the editor
app.label_tip_manage_access: Manage access by link or specific users
app.label_tip_restrict_access: Set custom access rules for your form
app.label_upgrade_for_custom_dates: Upgrade to Pro to access custom dates
app.desc_secure_payment: Your payment is secure and encrypted
app.desc_choose_plan: Choose the plan that fits your needs
app.label_desc_no_submission: No submissions received yet. Share the form to see responses appear here.
app.label_sub_cancel_warning_irreversible: This action is irreversible! All your premium features will be lost immediately.
app.desc_subscription_updated: Your plan has been successfully changed. All features are now available.
app.desc_update_failed: We couldn't update your subscription. Please try again or contact support.
app.desc_plan_change_notice: Plan changes take effect immediately. Prorated charges/credits will appear on your next invoice. New features unlock after confirmation.
app.desc_downgrade_plan_notice: Warning: Downgrading will immediately revoke access to premium features.
app.desc_no_invoices: When you have invoices, they'll appear here.
app.desc_delete_org: Permanently delete this organization and all its associated data from our servers. This action cannot be undone.
app.desc_org_active: Organization is fully operational. Can receive submissions and team members can access all features.
app.desc_org_inactive: Organization is paused. No new submissions accepted, but existing data remains accessible.
app.desc_organization_settings: Manage your organization’s general settings in { name }.
app.label_up_members: Unlock advanced member management features to better control your organization's access and permissions.
app.desc_no_members: Invite members to your organization and manage their access permissions.
app.desc_invite_member: Send invites to join your organization.
app.desc_pending_invitations: You don't have any pending organization invitations at the moment.
app.desc_remove_member: This will remove the member from the organization. This action is permanent.
app.desc_update_member: Modify member details and adjust role permissions.
app.desc_label_color: Set a custom color to represent this form in charts and analytical reports. This helps visually distinguish between multiple forms.
app.desc_no_access: You don’t have permission to view this content. Please contact your organization’s administrator to request access.
app.label_change_effective_next_billing: Changes will be effective at your next billing cycle
app.desc_review_changes_before_confirmation: Review the changes before confirming your new plan
app.warning_downgrade_description: Downgrading may limit access to some features. Review the changes carefully.
app.label_members_limit: This organization has reached its member limit. We are currently evaluating options to increase the limit.

s.err_sub: Error on submission, please try again.

auth.desc_reset_password: To reset your password, enter the email address you use to log in.
auth.label_suc_confirm_email: Thank you for confirming your email address. Your account is now fully activated and you can access our platform.

auth.desc_update_password: Change your password to enhance the security of your account.
auth.desc_suc_request_password: We have sent an email with instructions to reset your password. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions.
auth.desc_suc_update_password: Your password has been successfully updated. Use your new password to access your account.
auth.desc_login_headline: Enter your credentials to access your account
auth.desc_signup_headline: Fill in your details to explore everything we offer

landing.hero_subheadline: NexuForm lets you create, share and track forms with ease — no bloated tools, just speed, clarity and results.
landing.feat_subheadline: Smart, simple tools to build and share forms fast — without complexity.
landing.feat1_subheadline: Drag-and-drop interface with zero learning curve.
landing.feat2_subheadline: Get answers delivered to your dashboard as soon as they arrive.
landing.feat3_subheadline: Invite team members or clients with two clicks.
landing.feat4_subheadline: Start with optimized templates or build from scratch in minutes.
landing.htw_headline: Built for Founders Who Value Time
landing.htw_subheadline: Start fast, collect data, and grow.
landing.htw_subheadline_highlight: No friction, just forms that work.
landing.step1_desc: Use our simple editor to create your form effortlessly.
landing.step1_topic1: Choose a template or start from scratch.
landing.step1_topic2: Add questions with clear and practical blocks.
landing.step1_topic3: Publish with one click and start collecting instantly.
landing.step2_desc: Your form is accessible via a unique link, ready to collect responses.
landing.step2_topic1: Share via link — no login required.
landing.step2_topic2: Perfect for teams, clients and quick surveys.
landing.step3_desc: Track form submissions and export responses in seconds.
landing.step3_topic1: See all answers from your dashboard.
landing.step3_topic2: Export to CSV with one click.
landing.step3_topic3: Use feedback to improve and iterate quickly.
landing.pricing_headline: Pricing for Small Teams (and Agile Minds)
landing.pricing_subheadline: Free trial for 14 days. Then, choose a simple plan that grows with your team.
landing.faq1_a: You can test the platform for free for 14 days with limited access to features.
landing.faq2_q: What happens after the Free Trial ends?
landing.faq2_a: You'll need to choose a paid plan to continue using the platform after 14 days.
landing.faq3_q: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
landing.faq3_a: Yes! You can cancel anytime in your account settings.
landing.faq4_a: Yes, we offer email support during the trial and priority support for paid plans.
landing.cta_headline: Ready to create forms in less than 2 minutes?
landing.cta_subheadline: 14-day free trial. Simple, fast and no credit card required.
landing.cta_label: Built for makers, loved by founders
landing.usecases_headline: Built to Help Small Teams Succeed
landing.usecases_subheadline: From lead capture to onboarding, NexuForm adapts to your everyday needs.
landing.usecases_1_desc: Turn visitors into leads with sleek, high-converting forms.
landing.usecases_2_desc: Collect customer insights with engaging survey forms.
landing.usecases_3_desc: Improve faster by collecting structured bug reports.
landing.usecases_4_desc: Create frictionless onboarding experiences for new users.
landing.usecases_5_desc: Streamline internal processes with secure, branded forms.
landing.usecases_6_desc: Manage signups and RSVPs with ease using branded event forms.

pricing.headline: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subheadline: Find the plan that fits your workflow and growth stage
pricing.free_trial_description: Try all essential features free for 14 days. Upgrade to keep forms live and collecting data.
pricing.starter_description: Perfect for solo founders and freelancers who need reliable form tools
pricing.pro_description: Built for small teams that collaborate and need more control and flexibility
